title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 461.1 - Statement of policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 461.1 - Statement of policy

State Regulations
(a) The

Legislature has provided for public access to government records under the

Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) (Public Officers Law, article 6, sections
84-90). (b) This Part outlines the
procedures for obtaining records from the Office of Parks, Recreation and

Historic Preservation (office or OPRHP) and personnel responsibilities for
providing access to records. (c) The contact information for the Records Access Officer is OPRHP, 625 Broadway, Albany, NY 12233 or foil@parks.ny.gov. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
461.1

Amended

New

York State Register March 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 10, eff. 3/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
